Articles.Content:
In preperation for all the new planets in 0.17 I decided the first order of business would be to get some rovers roving the brave new worlds. I wanted power, reliability and power. So I built the SS-5.

Plenty of fuel in the default configuration, plus it can probably carry a lot more.

The lander stage is something special, it was inspired by the Curiosity Rover's Skycrane, and can bring itself down (safely) from a 70x70km Kerbin orbit with about 75% of it's fuel remaining.

All in all a great ship, here is a sample MÃƒÂ¼n mission: http://imgur.com/a/EvLAZ#0

Requires Tosh's Cart Mod Found Here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7854-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Carts-v1-33-Ladders-Context-menus-Multi-Unit-Support
Very laggy, even on lowest settings. but otherwise, wonderful ship!
